verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Left my fear by the side of the road, newline Hear You speak..won't let go newline Fall to my knees as I lift my hands to pray

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Got every reason to be here again, newline Father's love that draws me in newline And all my eyes wanna see is a glimpse of You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All I need is You, newline All I need is You Lord...Is you Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: One more day and it's not the same, newline Your Spirit calls my heart to sing newline Drawn to the voice of my Saviour once again,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Where would my soul be without Your Son, newline Gave His life to save the earth newline Rest in the thought that You're watching over me

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: You hold the universe, newline and You hold everyone on earth
